channel.title: Minecraft get smart
channel.description: FFS Why won't Notch send his updates to Bukkit before the release so it gives developers a chance to update their plugins so we don't have down servers for hours. Also Wtf is up with the retarded updates? Wolves are cool but...

item.title: Minecraft get smart
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Rix_:

It’s because the Bukkit developers are stupid. Why should Notch inform the Bukkit crew about a new version of Minecraft? If they want to provide a modding API to the Minecraft players, then they should do it smartly. The reason why plugins break every update is because they have to wait for Bukkit to be updated – the members of the crew manually refactor Minecraft (which is real dumb).

Give Bukkit update before, they update Bukkit, API released to the developers, Plugins updated, Update released, less then an hour of downtime

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft get smart

item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Because the obfuscate Minecraft every time they release a new version.
